did.head: Summary Information
did.unittitle: French Literature mss.,
did.abstract: Consists of individual items acquired separately either as a gift or purchased from a variety of sources, relating to or by French literary figures. Additions continue to be made.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for research.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Received from various sources at various times. Accession information is given with the item entry. The most recent additions made in 2004.

userestrict.head: Usage Restrictions
userestrict.p: Prior arrangements are not necessary before coming to the Library, however, patrons from out of town are encouraged to communicate with the Library in advance of their visits to ascertain availability of materials.
Photocopying permitted only with permission of the Curator of Manuscripts, Lilly Library.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Item], French Literature mss., Lilly Library, Indiana University, Bloomington, Indiana.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Consists of a collection of items received singly or in small groups from various sources at various times, which were not kept together as a distinct collection.

arrangement.head: Arrangement/Organization
arrangement.p: Arranged chronologically. Undated items are arranged alphabetically at the end of the series.

controlaccess.head: Indexing Terms

did.unittitle: 1859 June. Baudelaire, Charles Pierre, 1821-1867, poet. Fantòmes parisiens. A.D.

note.p: Author’s signature has been clipped from another manuscript and pasted to the verso of the first leaf, signed “Tout à vous Ch. Baudelaire.”
From the adjunct second leaf ¼ of the lower part has been cut off.
Written on the verso of the second leaf is a portion of a letter to an unnamed correspondent who has been idenitifed as Jean Morel, directeur of la Revue francaise.

Both poem and letter are undated but published under the assigned date of June, 1859, in Oeuvres Completes de Charles Baudelaire par M. Jacques Crepet (Paris, Editions Louis Conard) 1947, vol. 13, pages 321-324 (PQ2191 .A1 1923).
Poem first published in La Revue Contemporaine, September 15, 1859.
Significant variations from version published as "Les Sept Viellards" in the second edition of Les Fleurs du Mal in 1861 (Lilly PQ2191 .F6 1861).
Formerly in the library of Victor Meric.
